title: The King's Peace Day 6 wont complete
body: The missions is 'Be on the team that destroys the first tower on Summoner's Rift'. I have done this over 10 times now and the challenge will still not complete. Why????

replies.body: 3 ppl top lane (including myself) got the mission done for me after no luck for many games in a row. We also won. Hopefully the mission is still up for you guys that also struggled to get it to completed status :)
IKR, its really weird. I can complete the other missions but that one just won't complete.

I had the same issue, I got it completed on an URF game with 3 ppl (including myself) taking first tower in our top lane. I had tried norms and arams with no luck prior (as well as URF games) but that was what got it. I think it must need multiple teammates. (Please note we also won the game right after) Try for a 5 man game rushing mid tower or something if your mission hasn't already expired.
If the mission is still up, read my other comment :)
